#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType Par.

*[SPar Par]*

{{{
positiveInteger
  |

===  Documentation ===
        
			Type for elements specifying Par information.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	inclusive lower bound: 3inclusive upper bound: 9

----
    

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CTee Tee]
